thread.title: Echoes of Greece in Britain's growing reliance on debt-fuelled growth
thread.title_full: Echoes of Greece in Britain's growing reliance on debt-fuelled growth

author: Jeremy Warner
title: Echoes of Greece in Britain's growing reliance on debt-fuelled growth
text: Economics Echoes of Greece in Britain's growing reliance on debt-fuelled growth Greece's predicament was caused by the madness of the euro, which pumped up the economy with debt only to crush it down again. Worryingly, Britain's recovery is based largely on rising levels of debt, too Fireworks over the Acropolis after Greece joins the euro Photo: EPA
